content: seven loops on the yo and draw the yarn through both loops on the hook hook yo and draw the yarn through six loops yo and draw the yarn through the remaining two loops on the hook © 2021 cerulean orchid all rights reserved yarn dragon beanie | 2 pattern main color main color round 1 first round is worked in a mc chain 2 does not round 15 chain 2 *working over the chain-1 of round 14 count as st now or throughout pattern 10 puff in fp-puff around next skipped st of round 13 fp-puff mc slip_stitch to first puff to join 10 around next st of round 14 repeat from * around slip_stitch to first fp-puff to join 60 round 2 chain 2 *puff in next st fp-puff around same repeat from * around slip_stitch to first puff to join color a 20 round 16 repeat round 13 round 3 chain 2 *puff in next st fp-puff around same fp-puff around next st repeat from * around main color slip_stitch to first puff to join 30 round 17 chain 2 * fp-puff around next st of round 16 round 4 chain 2 *puff in next st fp-puff around working over the chain-1 of round 16 fp-puff around same fp-puff around next 2 sts repeat from * next skipped st of round 15 repeat from * around around slip_stitch to first puff to join 40 slip_stitch to first fp-puff to join 60 round 5 chain 2 *puff in next st fp-puff around round 18 repeat round 13 same fp-puff around next 3 sts repeat from * around slip_stitch to first puff to join 50 color a round 6 chain 2 *puff in next st fp-puff around round 19 repeat round 17 same fp-puff around next 4 sts repeat from * around slip_stitch to first puff to join 60 rnds 20-22 repeat round 7 three more times round 7 chain 2 fp-puff around each st slip_stitch to first round 23 chain 1 does not count as a st single_crochet in each st fp-puff to join 60 around slip_stitch to first single_crochet to join 60 measure for gauge the diameter of your hat s crown when fasten_off and weave in ends laid flat should measure 6 5 inches 16 5 cm top with pom -pom if desired rnds 8-12 repeat round 7 five more times round 13 chain 2 *fp-puff around next st chain 1 skip 1 repeat from * around slip_stitch to first fp-puff to join 60 color a round 14 chain 3 counts as beginning chain-2 and chain 1 st now and throughout pattern skip 1 working over the chain-1 of round 13 fp-puff around next skipped st of round 12 *chain 1 skip 1 working over the chain-1 of round 13 fp-puff around next skipped st of round 12 repeat from * around slip_stitch to third chain at the beginning of the round to join 60 © 2021 cerulean orchid all rights reserved yarn dragon beanie |
